statements: SELECT * FROM workout_schedule WHERE sport = 'Running';
SELECT athlete_id, availability FROM workout_schedule WHERE fitness_goal = 'Weight Loss' ORDER BY athlete_id ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, sport FROM workout_schedule WHERE availability = 'Morning' ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, fitness_goal, availability FROM workout_schedule WHERE sport = 'Swimming' AND availability = 'Evening';
SELECT athlete_id, sport, fitness_goal, availability FROM workout_schedule WHERE sport = 'Cycling' ORDER BY fitness_goal ASC, athlete_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM workout_schedule WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT sport, availability FROM workout_schedule WHERE athlete_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM workout_schedule WHERE fitness_goal = 'Weight Loss' ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, sport, fitness_goal, availability FROM workout_schedule WHERE athlete_id IN (3, 4, 5) ORDER BY sport, athlete_id;
SELECT COUNT(athlete_id), fitness_goal FROM workout_schedule GROUP BY fitness_goal HAVING COUNT(athlete_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM Athletes WHERE fitness_goal = 'Strength';
SELECT athlete_name, workout_date, workout_time FROM Athletes JOIN Schedules ON Athletes.athlete_id = Schedules.athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_name, sport, workout_time FROM Athletes JOIN Schedules ON Athletes.athlete_id = Schedules.athlete_id WHERE workout_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT athlete_name, duration FROM Athletes JOIN Schedules ON Athletes.athlete_id = Schedules.athlete_id WHERE workout_time BETWEEN '06:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT athlete_name, sport, fitness_goal FROM Athletes WHERE sport='Football';
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE availability='Yes' AND sport='Basketball';
SELECT athlete_name, workout_date, workout_time FROM Athletes JOIN Schedules ON Athletes.athlete_id = Schedules.athlete_id WHERE workout_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT athlete_name, workout_date, duration FROM Athletes JOIN Schedules ON Athletes.athlete_id = Schedules.athlete_id WHERE duration>30 ORDER BY workout_date DESC;

SELECT athlete_name, sport, workout_date, workout_time, duration FROM Athletes JOIN Schedules ON Athletes.athlete_id = Schedules.athlete_id WHERE sport='Soccer' ORDER BY workout_date, workout_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM athlete;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM athlete WHERE fitness_goal = 'Strength Training';
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, sport, availability FROM athlete ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM workout_schedule WHERE workout_type = 'Cardio' ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT coach_name, sport FROM coach;
SELECT * FROM athlete WHERE sport = 'Swimming';
SELECT athlete_name, fitness_goal FROM athlete WHERE availability = 'Available' ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, sport, fitness_goal, availability FROM athlete WHERE sport = 'Running' AND fitness_goal = 'Weight Loss' ORDER BY athlete_name ASC, availability DESC;

SELECT athlete_name, sport, workout_type, duration_minutes FROM athlete JOIN workout_schedule ON athlete.athlete_id = workout_schedule.athlete_id WHERE workout_type = 'Cardio' ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC, athlete_name ASC;
SELECT coach_name, COUNT(*) AS total_athletes FROM coach JOIN athlete ON coach.sport = athlete.sport GROUP BY coach_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_athletes DESC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM Athletes WHERE fitness_goal IS NOT NULL;
SELECT athlete_id, availability FROM Athletes WHERE sport = 'Basketball';
SELECT athlete_name FROM Athletes WHERE availability = 'Available' ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS num_workouts FROM WorkoutSchedules GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING num_workouts > 2;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, sport, fitness_goal FROM Athletes WHERE availability='Available';
SELECT athlete_name, sport, workout_date, workout_time FROM Athletes JOIN WorkoutSchedules ON Athletes.athlete_id = WorkoutSchedules.athlete_id;
SELECT Athletes.athlete_name, Sports.sport_name FROM Athletes JOIN Sports ON Athletes.sport = Sports.sport_name;
SELECT athlete_name, fitness_goal FROM Athletes JOIN FitnessGoals ON Athletes.fitness_goal = FitnessGoals.goal_name;
SELECT * FROM athlete ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, sport FROM athlete WHERE sport = 'Swimming';
SELECT athlete_name, fitness_goal FROM athlete WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM workout_schedule WHERE workout_date >= '2022-08-01' ORDER BY workout_date ASC;
SELECT coach_name, coach_specialty FROM coach;
SELECT * FROM athlete WHERE sport = 'Swimming';
SELECT athlete_name, fitness_goal FROM athlete WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT coach_name, coach_specialty FROM coach WHERE coach_specialty = 'Running' ORDER BY coach_name DESC;

SELECT athlete.athlete_name, workout_schedule.workout_date, exercise.exercise_name FROM athlete JOIN workout_schedule ON athlete.athlete_id = workout_schedule.athlete_id JOIN athlete_workout ON athlete.athlete_id = athlete_workout.athlete_id JOIN exercise ON athlete_workout.exercise_id = exercise.exercise_id WHERE workout_schedule.workout_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY workout_schedule.workout_date ASC;

SELECT athlete_name, SUM(sets*reps) AS total_reps FROM athlete JOIN athlete_workout ON athlete.athlete_id = athlete_workout.athlete_id GROUP BY athlete_name HAVING total_reps > 50 ORDER BY total_reps DESC;
